origin.quirks.acid.name: Acid
origin.quirks.acid.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Heal Quirk grants the user the ability to heal themselves and others, accelerating natural recovery processes. However, the greater the amount of health restored, the more stamina the user expends. The Quirk works both on living creatures and the user themselves, with a focus on rapid, targeted healing at a personal cost.
power.quirks.acid.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.acid.move_selector.descript: The Move Selector allows the user to toggle between Healing Kiss and Self-Heal. Slot 1 selects Healing Kiss, and Slot 2 selects Self-Heal. [Secondary]

origin.quirks.heal.description:
Quirk Type: Emitter

The Heal Quirk grants the user the ability to heal themselves and others, accelerating natural recovery processes. However, the greater the amount of health restored, the more stamina the user expends. The Quirk works both on living creatures and the user themselves, with a focus on rapid, targeted healing at a personal cost.
power.quirks.heal.move_selector.name: Move Selector
power.quirks.heal.move_selector.descript: The Move Selector allows the user to toggle between Healing Kiss and Self-Heal. Slot 1 selects Healing Kiss, and Slot 2 selects Self-Heal. [Secondary]
power.quirks.heal.healing_kiss.name: Healing Kiss (Slot 1)
power.quirks.heal.healing_kiss.descripti:
The user channels their healing ability through a kiss-like gesture or action, focusing on an ally or mob. The amount of health recovered depends on the target's current health, with those more severely injured receiving stronger regeneration. However, the larger the health recovery, the more stamina the user loses, leading to temporary slowness and weakness effects. [Right-Click On Entity]

- §lHealth Recovery§r: Scales with target's current health.
- §lStamina Cost§r: The more health recovered, the greater the slowness and weakness effect on the user.
power.quirks.heal.self_heal.name: Self-Heal (Slot 2)
power.quirks.heal.self_heal.description:
Using their own healing ability, the user restores their health, with the same principles applying. The more health the user needs to recover, the greater the stamina cost. The move sacrifices speed and strength temporarily to regain health, leaving the user with slowness and weakness proportional to the health restored. [Primary]

- §lHealth Recovery§r: Based on user's current health.
- §lStamina Cost§r: As with Healing Kiss, greater health recovery results in more severe stamina depletion.
origin.quirks.severance.name: Severance
origin.quirks.severance.description: Unleash slashes at long-range or through physical contact, to cut down enemies. This Quirk also empowers you to unleash a burning hellfire arrow.
